oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Thompson Show (WACO) - 1947-09-01
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Hank Thompson radio show sponsored by Hamilton Furniture Company of Waco, Texas. Originally broadcast 1947-09-01, with announcer Bob Walker.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Bob Walker) -- Theme (Brazos Valley Rancho) -- I'll Be Your Sweetheart For A Day (Hank Thompson) -- Hamilton Furniture Company commercial (Bob Walker) -- Along The Trail To Dripping Springs (Hank Thompson) -- Hamilton Furniture Company commercial (Bob Walker) -- Whoa Sailor (Hank Thompson) -- Hamilton Furniture Company commercial (Bob Walker) -- I'll Hold You In My Heart (Till I Can Hold You In My Arms) (Hank Thompson) -- Bob Walker and Hank Thompson talk -- Rock In The Ocean (Hank Thompson) -- Bob Walker and Hank Thompson talk -- Stay A Little Longer (Hank Thompson) -- Closing statement (Bob Walker) -- Theme (Brazos Valley Rancho)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Thompson, Hank; Walker, Bob, 1917-2007; WACO (Radio station : Waco, Tex.)
